revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Single-board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://wiki.radxa.com/Rock4/4cplus |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Radxa |model = Rock Pi 4 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = C+ |revision = V1.2 |subrevision = (4GB) |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2A3PA-ROCK4C |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3399-T; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_cores2 = 4 |cpu1_total_cores = 6 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A72 |cpu1_type2 = ARM |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz |cpu1spd2 = 1.4 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q64FV; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H9HCNNNBKUML-HRNME; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2017.09; |stockos = Linux;5.10.110;Debian 11
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, NGFF (M.2), USB 2.0, USB 3.0, MicroSD Card slot, eMMC module connector, Micro HDMI |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = 1 |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = USB (Type C) Female |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, via GPIO header,, (150000 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 5.0, MicroSD Card slot, eMMC module connector, Micro HDMI 2.0a, SPDIF, Audio out (3.5 mm), MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, SPI, I2C, I2S, ADC, GPIO, UART, PoE Expansion header |addchip = Display Interface Controller;Radxa;RA620-1;;1;,,, Power Management IC w/ RTC;Rockchip;RK809-3;;1;,,, Asynchronous Boost Converter for LEDs;Richtek;RT9293;;1;,,, 16Kbit 2-Wire Serial EEPROM;Shanghai Belling);BL24C016;;1;,,, 4-bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;Union Semi;UM3204;;2;,,, 4A 2MHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;ETA Solutions;ETA3521;;1;,,, 5.5V 6A 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR837;;1;,,, 5.5V 6A 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR838;;1;,,, 5V 1A USB Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280AAC;;2;,,, 2A 1MHz Synchro Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8089A;;2;,,, High-PSRR 500mA LDO;Powtech;PT5108;;1;,,, ESD Suppressor Diode;TI;TPD4E05U06;;6; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = radxa |defaultpass = radxa |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android 11, Ubuntu 20.04, Armbian, Manjaro ARM, LibreELEC, DietPi
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/01/2022 |estreldate = 05/2022 |estprice = 60 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0BPHPV8MB |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AzureWave AW-CM256SM |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1 = Cypress;CYP43455; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 433 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 150/150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|Radxa|List of SBCs}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3399-T Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A72) @1.5GHz :+ Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.4GHz *GPU: ''Mali-T864'' (OpenGL ES3.1, OpenVG 1.1, OpenCL, DX11) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 8MB (SPI NOR) Flash, eMMC module connector, :TF card (max.256GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 3.0 (OTG), 2x USB 2.0 ports *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power Source: USB Type-C (5V only)
==Links of Interest== *[https://linuxgizmos.com/radxa-offers-affordable-rock-pi-4-c-equipped-with-rockchip-rk3399-t-processor/ ''Radxa offers affordable Rock Pi 4 C+'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/05/05/rock-pi-4-model-c-sbc-features-1-5-ghz-rockchip-rk3399-t-cpu-dual-hdmi-output/ ''ROCK Pi 4 Model C+ SBC'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://liliputing.com/rock-pi-4-model-c-is-more-of-a-minus-less-powerful-than-the-model-c-but-also-cheaper/ ''Rock Pi 4 Model C+'' on '''liliputing''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Radxa Rock Pi 4C+ (4GB) Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Radxa Rock Pi 4C+ (4GB) Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
